skillTree.name: Chaos Steed
skillTree.description: The dread steeds of Chaos are more than mere horses, but creatures tainted by Daemon blood, said to be gifts from the Dark Gods themselves.

effects.description: Mount: Chaos Steed

skillTree.name: Gorebeast Chariot
skillTree.description: A massive construction of hell-forged metal, mutant beast and jagged blade, ridden to war only by the bloodthirsty.

effects.description: Mount: Gorebeast Chariot

skillTree.name: Juggernaut
skillTree.description: Mighty beasts of groaning iron and brass, taller than a man and possessed of a crushing mass.

effects.description: Mount: Juggernaut

skillTree.name: Brutal Warrior
skillTree.description: The favour of Khorne is earned in blood and the brutal decimation of His foes.

effects.description:
Khorne Authority: +1
	(Hero's army)

Slaanesh Authority: -1
	(Hero's army)

Khorne Authority: +2
	(Hero's army)

Slaanesh Authority: -2
	(Hero's army)

Khorne Authority: +3
	(Hero's army)

Slaanesh Authority: -3
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Infernal Champion
skillTree.description: The Warriors of Chaos are the playthings of Gods and given many gifts, including formidable fighting skills.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10%

skillTree.name: Aura of Chaos
skillTree.description: The shadow of the Ruinous Powers looms large, protecting those who bear their mark.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 10%

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Blade Master
skillTree.description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

effects.description: Melee attack: +5

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

effects.description: Charge bonus: +6
Charge bonus: +16
Charge bonus: +30

skillTree.name: Thick-Skinned
skillTree.description: Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.

effects.description: Armour: +3
Armour: +8
Armour: +15

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

effects.description: Melee defence: +3
Melee defence: +7
Melee defence: +12

skillTree.name: Deadly Blade
skillTree.description: A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!

effects.description: Melee attack: +3
Melee attack: +7
Melee attack: +12

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

effects.description: Ability: "Foe-Seeker"

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +5%
Weapon strength: +12%
Weapon strength: +20%

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

effects.description: Hit points: +3%
Hit points: +8%
Hit points: +15%

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

effects.description: Leadership: +4
Leadership: +8
Leadership: +12

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

effects.description: Melee defence: +3
Melee defence: +7
Melee defence: +12

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

effects.description: Ability: "Deadly Onslaught"

skillTree.name: Chaos Gladiator
skillTree.description: Standing face to face with your enemy means getting to watch the light fade from their eyes when you win.

effects.description: Melee attack: +5
Armour-piercing weapon damage: +50
Bonus vs Infantry: +5

skillTree.name: Chaos Commander
skillTree.description: A leader is needed on the field of battle, able to rally the forces of Chaos in even the most dire situations.

effects.description: Leadership aura size: +25%
Ability: "Stand or Die!"

skillTree.name: Chaos Strategist
skillTree.description: Every dark army requires a particularly twisted mind, capable of thinking three steps ahead of the enemy.

effects.description: Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 50

Casualty replenishment rate: +5%
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Vengeful Scorcher
skillTree.description: The raging fire of hate manifests itself in battle, immolating enemies in its smouldering heat.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10%
Passive ability: "Hellblade"

skillTree.name: Raging Stalwart
skillTree.description: No magic can deter one driven by the murderous force of fury.

effects.description: Ward save: 5%

Spell resistance: 10%
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Brutal Ritualist
skillTree.description: "Sacrifice in the Blood God's name, and soak in the blessings of his favour!"

effects.description:
Khorne Authority: +1
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Training
skillTree.description: This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 20
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 35
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 50

skillTree.name: Spread Control
skillTree.description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description:
Control: -1
	(local enemy province)
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional -1

Control: -2
	(local enemy province)
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional -2

Control: -3
	(local enemy province)
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional -3

skillTree.name: Assault Garrison
skillTree.description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Assassinate
skillTree.description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.

effects.description: Assassinate action: Additional 3% success chance
Assassinate action: Additional 8% success chance
Assassinate action: Additional 15% success chance

skillTree.name: Assault Units
skillTree.description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

effects.description: Hero action cost: -10%
Hero action success chance: +1%
Hero action cost: -20%
Hero action success chance: +3%
Hero action cost: -40%
Hero action success chance: +6%

Control: -1
	(local enemy province)

backgroundSkills.name: Diabolic Splendour
backgroundSkills.description: Oh, horrific wonder! Vile awe! Such hateful majesty!

effects.description: Leadership aura size: +40%

Undivided Authority: +1
	(own army)

backgroundSkills.name: Burning Body
backgroundSkills.description: The champion is surrounded by crackling flames that burn his enemies whilst leaving his own body untouched.

effects.description: Enables flaming attacks
Fire resistance: 50%

backgroundSkills.name: Dark Fury
backgroundSkills.description: Fatigue is no issue when one is driven by the darkest rage imaginable.

effects.description: Vigour loss reduction: -25%
Charge bonus: +35

backgroundSkills.name: Evil Eyeball
backgroundSkills.description: Those blessed by Chaos see not only what is before them, but also what lurks in shadow, hiding in the periphery.

effects.description: Campaign line of sight: +25%

Ambush defence chance: +10%
	(own army)

backgroundSkills.name: Hideous Visage
backgroundSkills.description: The champion has been rewarded with a hideous appearance, grotesque enough to wither the hearts of men.

effects.description:
Control: -8
	(local enemy province)
Attribute: Causes Fear

backgroundSkills.name: Iron Skin
backgroundSkills.description: Granted skin as strong as iron plate, there is little that can penetrate the champion's defences.

effects.description: Armour: +25
Unit mass: +25%

backgroundSkills.name: Scaled Skin
backgroundSkills.description: The champion's skin is covered with a thousand reptilian scales, each as tough as Dragonhide.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 25%
Physical resistance: 5%

backgroundSkills.name: Slaughterer's Strength
backgroundSkills.description: Enemies break like brittle twigs beneath the onslaught of such overwhelming strength.

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 10% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 10% casualties inflicted
Bonus vs Infantry: +12

backgroundSkills.name: Opened Eyes
backgroundSkills.description: Some are blessed by a dark understanding, able to gleam knowledge from every experience.

effects.description: Character experience gain: +15%

backgroundSkills.name: Unearthly Reflexes
backgroundSkills.description: A foe may strike fast, but those evolved by Chaos move faster still.

effects.description: Speed: +15%
Melee defence: +8

backgroundSkills.name: Unholy Strike
backgroundSkills.description: The champion can channel the dark strength flowing through his veins to deliver a single blow that can shatter a fortress wall.

effects.description: Assassinate action: Additional 15% success chance
Bonus vs Large: +12
